TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComSoapPublishError extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Error handler for publishing SOAP-enabled services in COM+ applications.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ComSoapPublishError class provides a static <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ComSoapPublishError.Report%2A> method for writing to an event log errors that were encountered while publishing SOAP-enabled COM interfaces in COM+ applications.
ComSoapPublishError is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use the class directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Report(string s) cil managed

Docs.param: An error message to be written to the event log.
Docs.summary: Writes to an event log an error encountered while publishing SOAP-enabled COM interfaces in COM+ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Report method is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use the method directly in your code.
